This is an amazing, practical example of non-violence in action. If I can learn speak like this, my life will become so much easier and successful. Voss‚Äôs ‚Äúhostage negotiation‚Äú imitation of Rosenberg‚Äòs work‚Ä¶ well, it‚Äôs nice to give people an introduction to it.
Rather than pointing out a mistake when someone lies to defend their position, consider that the other person is scared.

Focus on the needs. Tell the other guy: ‚ÄúI really need that training I am requesting, because I am scared that I will end up back in prison if I don‚Äôt get it‚Äù rather than approaching the person with the idea that he‚Äôs a faceless bureaucrat who doesn‚Äôt care about me.

The issue is that Mom didn‚Äôt know about this. She wasn‚Äôt trying to be mean, it‚Äôs just something that she never learned (to differentiate between the ‚Äúprotective‚Äù use of force and the ‚Äúpunitive‚Äù one). She didn‚Äôt know that positive reinforcement has been shown more effective than positive punishment for changing behavior. (Note: studies that get funded and published also depend on the current political environment, and our environment was tending towards non-violence‚Äîso the studies that psychologists cite aren‚Äôt necessarily honest‚Äîthey may be the only kind possible in the time they were published).
‚ÄúI have to‚Äú -> ‚ÄúI choose to‚Ä¶ because I want [insert reason here]‚Äú

Oh. He‚Äôs saying that he *chooses* to write the clinical reports, not that he *has* to write them. As simple as that. There‚Äôs nothing extra to add to this (I brought some baggage that I‚Äôve heard from people who misunderstood this and we‚Äôre re-teaching it in psychology, saying that you should decide that you‚Äôre choosing to do some thing and therefore feel happy about it, or deciding to refer to their obligations as challenges) Why acknowledging that it‚Äôs a choice, he gets to decide whether or not he wants to keep making this choice. He realized what the motivation was for making his choice, and he decided that he didn‚Äôt want to keep making this choice for this reason (in the example, the choice was writing the reports, and the reason was his desire for income)
How is writing the clinical reports a choice? It‚Äôs a requirement‚Ä¶

So this Chris Voss literally just took a Jew‚Äôs work (NVC) and rebranded it as hostage negotiation. Made a name for himself using Marshall‚Äôs work. Note: Marshall would be happy that Voss is teaching the NVC. It‚Äôs just me that finds it ‚Ä¶disgusting (?) that he plagiarized this work and didn‚Äôt even cite it
When to interrupt: once you‚Äôve heard one word more than you want to hear. The longer you wait to interrupt, the harder it will be to do it civilly

When someone doesn‚Äôt comply with your request, empathize with them. This way they‚Äôll know that it was a request, and not a demand
